Name: Hyper Treasure - The Legend of Macaron
About the game: Noracam has come to ruin, where the legendary treasure, 'Macaron' is said to be hidden. Without knowing it was the most dangerous place that can experience ... Keep making the best choices and get to the depths of the ruin Can Noracam get the legendary treasure? Solve mysteries, with simple mouse operations There are several QTEs against fierce monsters Also, there are extras after winning the game
